=ynn.util.collections=

The {{{ynn.util.collections}}} project contains utilities to enhance {{{java.util}}} collections API. This project contains the sub-projects listed below.

==Graph Collections==
Generic graph API for representing and manipulating graphs (of vertices and edges). The implementation supports both general graphs and directed graphs, but it can be extended and customized.

==SQL "like" Collections==
Collections which enable "SQL like" CRUD operations. In oppose to other similar solutions which uses parsing of strings with "SQL" statements, this framework is part of the java code - no parsing is done, no reflection is used. This enables design-time protection, no need to fail during runtime for the first time due to syntax error...
